description:
Based in Whiteville, we at William C. Gore, Jr., PLLC, advocate for clients throughout southeastern North Carolina in criminal defense and personal injury matters. Our law office takes cases that involve issues such as the following:

•Drunk driving and traffic offenses

•Drug crimes

•Car and trucking accidents

•Wrongful death

The founder of our law office, William Gore, is a former prosecutor and judge who brings decades of experience to our practice. From the age of nine, after witnessing injustice among workers in the tobacco fields, Mr. Gore knew he wanted to advocate for people who needed a voice. That day, he made up his mind to protect people and their rights.

Today, our team does just that in the courtroom as well as behind closed doors. We are committed to delivering results that exceed our clients' expectations, both in terms of outcomes to their cases as well as the way they are treated. Our attorneys maintain the values we grew up with in a small town while providing people with the resources and representation that matches a large firm.

Working with us means having a strong team in your corner. William C. Gore, Jr., PLLC, accepts credit cards. Our law office also provides free initial consultations. We hold honors that include a "Superb" rating on Avvo.
